name: Reactor Shutdown
text: Target 1 "Reactor" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; Destroy those cards and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Reactor" monster with a different name from that destroyed monster from your Deck. You can banish this card from your GY then target up to 2 of your banished "Reactor" cards; add them to your hand. You can only use one effect of "Reactor Shutdown" per turn and only once that turn.
